CustomField.description: Either shows products just on this agreement, on the agreement's parent (regional), or on the agreement's grandparent (national)
CustomField.label: Regional/National Filter

value.fullName: Show Current and Chain Account Pricing
value.label: Show Current and Chain Account Pricing

value.fullName: Ignore Regional Chain AND National Agreement Lines (if any)
value.label: Ignore Regional Chain AND National Agreement Lines (if any)

value.fullName: Show Regional Chain AND National Agreement Lines (if any)
value.label: Show Regional Chain AND National Agreement Lines (if any)
